name: SkyGarden
description:
This is my first attempt to participate in a jam (Mini Jam 119: Heaven²).

In a heavenly paradise, there is the Sky Garden, a floating island in the sky, guarded by a robot guardian. The game could tell you that it's super-simplified resource management; you must repair the lighthouse that keeps the island in the air; but keeping in mind that everything can die.

Blessings and have fun :D

Game controls:

  • keyboard arrows (up and down) to move between questions.
  • space to accept and run the dialogues.
  • ctrl or Esc key to cancel options.
  • Right mouse click to scroll through dialogs and to select options.

Note: 

  • The game was made in RPGMaker MV
  • The game art was done by myself, (and I'm also using some sounds, graphics and typography thanks to the same editor as RPGMaker MV).
